New Records: Sri Lanka completed the highest ever chase on this ground and the highest ever chase against Afghanistan in T20s.
Key Match Events: Dilshan Madushanka took 2 wickets for 36 runs in 4 overs.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took 2 wickets for 30 runs in 4 overs.
Naveen-ul-Haq took 2 wickets for 40 runs in 4 overs.
Najibullah Zadran received the Catch of the Match award for dismissing Dasun Shanaka.
Sri Lanka won by 4 wickets with 5 balls remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: Rahmanullah Gurbaz expressed disappointment with the result, mentioning they were short by 25 runs and didn't finish well in the final overs.
Winning Captain Dasun Shanaka highlighted the belief in the dressing room and the execution of plans by the team.
Losing Captain Mohammed Nabi reflected on being 20-25 runs short and not fielding or bowling well enough.
Bhanuka Rajapaksa mentioned the importance of being cautious against spinners and his floating role in the batting order.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Sharjah Cricket Stadium.
Sri Lanka elected to field first after winning the toss.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz was named Player of the Match.
